Quick Start¶

hi

Installation¶

Using STADLE¶

Server¶

::

For macOS: conda env create -n stadleenv -f ./setups/stadleenv.yaml For Linux: conda env create -n stadleenv -f ./setups/stadleenv_linux.yaml

Note: The environment has Python 3.7.4. There is some known issues of ipfshttpclient with Python 3.7.2 and older.

User (Agent) Device¶

For macOS:
conda env create -n stadleenv -f ./setups/stadleenv.yaml
For Linux:
conda env create -n stadleenv -f ./setups/stadleenv_linux.yaml

Database Device¶

For macOS:
conda env create -n stadleenv -f ./setups/stadleenv.yaml
For Linux:
conda env create -n stadleenv -f ./setups/stadleenv_linux.yaml
